## Properties

| Property              | Attribute                | Description                    | Type      | Default                                                         |
| --------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------ | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `evryLoginURL`        | `evry-login-u-r-l`       | URL for EVRY Login client      | `string`  | `'https://acc.ssfbank.no/online/api/idp_login/evry/start_auth'` |
| `ssfLoginServiceHost` | `ssf-login-service-host` | The host to SSF Login Services | `string`  | `'localhost:8070'`                                              |
| `useSecureConnection` | `use-secure-connection`  | Use secure connection          | `boolean` | `false`                                                         |
